title: View Source Mystery
description:
Every website is built with HTML code that you can see! Sometimes secrets are hidden right in the page source.

Your task: I've hidden a secret message in an HTML comment on this very challenge page! Can you find it?

STEPS:
1. Right-click anywhere on this page
2. Select 'View Page Source' (or press Ctrl+U / Cmd+Option+U)
3. Look through the HTML for a comment - it starts with <!-- and ends with -->
4. Find the hidden password inside the comment
5. Submit it as FLAG{password_you_found}

HINT: HTML comments are used by developers to leave notes in their code. They won't show up on the visible page, only in the source code!
hints: Right-click anywhere on a webpage and look for 'View Page Source'
HTML comments start with <!-- and end with -->
The password is hidden somewhere in the HTML comments - keep scrolling!
